data.message: Just checking in, fans are suppose to be lifting the man up, and each other for that matter, not criticism rather critic the issue/item. I hear you, Bradley, my on a WP mobile and its limited, none the less, power to all who are hooked up seamlessly. Plus I'll get new equipment when the time is right, and Eminem sites will still be there. Cool... And I'm happy to look in the mirror, knowing I am still his biggest fan.
